metadata.title: CVE-2024-26781 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:

locking dependencydetected 6.8.0-rc4-syzkaller-00212-g40b9385dd8e6 #0 Not taintedsyz-executor.2/24141 is trying to acquire lock: ffff888045870130(k-sk_lock-AF_INET6){+.+.}-{0:0}, at: tcp_diag_put_ulpnet/ipv4/tcp_diag.c:100 [inline] ffff888045870130(k-sk_lock-AF_INET6){+.+.}-{0:0}, at: tcp_diag_get_aux+0x738/0x830net/ipv4/tcp_diag.c:137 but task is already holding lock: ffffc9000135e488(&h->lhash2[i].lock){+.+.}-{2:2}, at: spin_lockinclude/linux/spinlock.h:351 [inline] ffffc9000135e488(&h->lhash2[i].lock){+.+.}-{2:2}, at:
